[[tab Usage and other info]]
If youâ€™d like to make something out of my works, still available on the site or not, you are free to do so. I will not be posting new works to the site, and will not be expanding on the works I have posted (including Ethcom Observer Orientation, which I posted with the intention to segue into a bigger series). Feel free to make whatever you will out of any of this.

If you would like a reference copy of SCPs Iâ€™ve deleted from the site, feel free to check my sandbox.
